casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2006-1687. State v. Silverman.

Franklin App. Nos. 05AP-837, 05AP-838 and 05AP-839, 2006-Ohio-3826. Discretionary appeal accepted on Proposition of Law No. I; cause held for the decision in 2006-1245 and 2006-1383, State v. Payne, Franklin App. No. 05AP-517, 2006-Ohio-2552; and briefing schedule stayed.

Lundberg Stratton, J., would also accept the appeal on all other Propositions of Law. Pfeifer, O’Donnell and Lanzinger, JJ., dissent.
